page.title: 03ROSEFIELD FARM,ANNAN
page.content: {Rosefield Farm}is one of the farms in our block.It is a seed potato producing farm of 110 acres.The present owners took over the farm in 1960.They have 200 acres under potatoes, which means they have to rent fields from neighbouring farms. Twenty seven varieties of potato are grown to supply farms in South England.The varieties are:ARRAN PILOT,HOMEGUARD,PENTLAND JAVELIN,ULSTER CHIEFTAIN,ULSTER PRINCE,ULSTER SCEPTRE,SHARP'S EXPRESS DUKE OF YORK,MARIS BARD,SUTTON'S FOREMOST,VANESSA,RED CRAIGS ROYAL,MARIS, PEER,CATRIONA,WILIA,PENTLAND CROWN,PENTLAND DELL,PENTLAND HAWK,PENTLAND IVORY,PENTLAND SQUIRE,MAJESTIC,MARIS PIPER,DESIREE,KING EDWARD,DRAYTON,REDSKIN,ROMANO.
